answerList: When the button pointing behind is pressed, Thymio's top LEDs become green.
When the button pointing left is pressed, Thymio's top LEDs become green.
When the button pointing behind is pressed, Thymio's top LEDs become blue
When the button pointing right is pressed, Thymio's bottom LEDs become green.
When the button pointing in front is pressed, Thymio's bottom LEDs become green.
When the button pointing in front is pressed, Thymio's top LEDs become green.
